source_caption_data.pre_caption: This scenery shot features a rack focus effect. The video begins with a completely blurred, abstract image of green and white. It then sharpens to reveal a view of a waterfall cascading down a rock face, framed by the dark silhouettes of tree leaves in the foreground.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This scenery shot features a rack focus effect. The video begins with a completely blurred, abstract image of green and white. It then sharpens to reveal a view of a waterfall cascading down a rock face, framed by the dark silhouettes of tree leaves in the foreground.

bad_caption: The video opens with a blurred view that gradually comes into focus, revealing a busy city street where several cyclists ride past parked cars. In the foreground, pedestrians cross the road, moving from left to right, while a bus slowly approaches from the distance.
